name: consoledev
title: Console Dev
description: An extension to discover the best tools and beta releases for developers (via console.dev)
author: fedevitaledev

commands.name: tools_list
commands.title: Tools List
commands.subtitle: Console Dev
commands.description: Each week Console reviews the best tools for developers.

commands.name: betas_list
commands.title: Betas List
commands.subtitle: Console Dev
commands.description: Each week Console reviews the best tools for developers.

commands.name: interviews_list
commands.title: Interviews List
commands.subtitle: Console Dev
commands.description: A series of interviews with the developers behind the tools featured on console.dev

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
